mapper.select: select e.no as no, name, user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, state, join_date as joinDate, resignation_date as resignationDate, h_phone as Hphone, level, gender, disabled, birth, ext_number as extNumber, profile_url as profileUrl, department_no as departmentNo, position_no as positionNo, p_name as pName, divName as dName, depName as department from position, (select no, user_id, user_pw, employees.name, state, join_date, resignation_date, h_phone, level, gender, disabled, birth, ext_number, profile_url, department_no, position_no, depName, divName from employees left join ( select b.name, a.d_name as depName, b.d_name as divName from department a right join ( select a.name, b.p_no, b.d_name from employees a, department b where a.department_no = b.no) b on a.no = b.p_no) c on employees.name = c.name) e where position.no = e.position_no order by depName, divName, pName
